description: Bradford are held to a 0-0 draw at Accrington to keep them second in League Two.
title: Accrington Stanley 0-0 Bradford City
title_page: Accrington Stanley 0-0 Bradford City - BBC Sport
maintext:
Accrington Stanley have failed to score in each of their last four league games against Bradford City, after failing to find the net in just one of their prior 13 against the Bantams.
Bradford City have won each of their last four league games against Accrington Stanley, one more victory than across their prior 13 EFL matches against the Lancashire side combined (W3 D5 L5).
Since February 2022, Accrington have won just one of their 18 league games against sides from Yorkshire (D4 L13), though that sole victory did come on home soil against Harrogate Town in August 2023 (2-1).
Bradford begin this matchday sat on 69 points after 38 matches in League Two this season, the Bantamsâ€™ highest points tally at this stage of a campaign since 1998-99 when they were eventually promoted to the Premier League.
